channel.title: Simple simple help
channel.description:
Hey, when i attack an NPC it shows the damage on the npc but my weapon doesn't move. nothing moves. But when i go and pk people, my weapon moves normally. any ideas on how to fix that?
and how can i get something like this?
[img]http://i951.photobucket.com/albums/ad351/tman915/options.png?t=1266879195[/img]
so that when i click a portal it gives me all those options, and when i click one of them, it teles me there! I found one like it on my client. And copy pasted it and changed the object. So now when I click the portal that comes up. But it teles me to the spot where I copy pasted from. How do I change that without changing the tele spot from where I copied?

item.title: Simple simple help
